             String subElement)
        Forms a key from the 2 provided substrings (item and file/class).
        Parameters:
        itemName - The name of the item that should form the key.
        subElement - The sub-item element (file or class) that should form a key with item.
        Returns:
        The merged key.

      • updateArray

        protected String[] updateArray(String[] existingArray,
                   String[] newValues)
        Updates the array with new values. If the array was actually changed, returns the new array. Otherwise, returns null.
        Parameters:
        existingArray - The array that should be updated.
        newValues - The new values that should be added.
        Returns:
        The new, updated, array that contains new values or null if array was not changed.
